meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Privacy Policy for LiveStreamRecorder. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: We keep things simple. We collect minimal data and do not track you. No invasive analytics, no selling data to third parties. Your privacy matters to us.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: LiveStreamRecorder.com is the data controller responsible for your personal data. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, you can contact us at:

whatWeCollect.title: What We Collect
whatWeCollect.intro: When you create an account, we store:

items.emailDesc: to let you log in and recover your account
items.streamersDesc: to show you content from streamers you are interested in

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: Under the GDPR, we process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

items.contractDesc: Processing is necessary to provide you with our services
items.consentDesc: You have given consent for specific purposes (e.g., marketing emails)
items.legitimateInterestDesc: To improve our services and prevent fraud

payment.title: Payment Processing
payment.content: For paid subscriptions, we use Stripe as our payment processor. Stripe collects and processes your payment information directly. We do not store your credit card details on our servers.
payment.stripePolicy: Stripe's privacy policy can be found at: stripe.com/privacy

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.intro: We use Umami, a privacy-focused analytics tool, to understand how our site is used. This helps us improve the experience.
analytics.footer: All data is anonymized and stored on our own servers in Europe.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.intro: We retain your data only as long as necessary:

dataStorage.title: Where Your Data Is Stored
dataStorage.content: Our servers are located in Europe. Your data is processed and stored in compliance with GDPR requirements. We do not transfer your personal data outside the European Economic Area (EEA) unless necessary for service provision (e.g., Stripe payment processing) and with appropriate safeguards in place.

thirdParties.title: Third Parties
thirdParties.intro: We do not sell your data to anyone. We only share data with:
thirdParties.footer: We do not use third-party advertising networks or sell your personal information.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.intro: We use only essential cookies necessary for the website to function properly:
cookies.footer: We do not use tracking cookies, advertising cookies, or third-party analytics cookies.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.accessDesc: Request a copy of your personal data
items.restrictDesc: Limit how we use your data
items.portabilityDesc: Receive your data in a portable format
items.objectDesc: Object to processing based on legitimate interests

rights.footer: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at contact@livestreamrecorder.com

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Service is not intended for anyone under the age of 18 years old. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18.
children.contact: If you believe that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately at contact@livestreamrecorder.com, and we will take steps to delete such information from our systems.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, secure servers, and access controls. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Your Account
deleteAccount.content: To delete your account, go to Settings then Delete Account.
deleteAccount.footer: Once deleted, all your data is permanently removed from our servers. This action cannot be undone.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, your data, or your rights, please contact us:
contact.footer: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority (such as the Danish Data Protection Agency - Datatilsynet) if you believe your data protection rights have been violated.

footerNote: If we update this policy, we will post changes here with a new date. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
